thread.section_title: Usgobuy Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Usgobuy | www.usgobuy.com | 3 of 10
thread.title: grv15

author: grv15
title: grv15
text:
I am using USgoBuy from quite some time. Their service is very reliable and has the many advantages like:
@ It allows me to shop offers even when the merchant doesn't ship to my country.
@ It allows me to consolidate packages from different merchants into a single package for international shipping free of cost which can save on hefty shipping costs.
@ Their customer service replies promptly and assists in every way possible. I contacted them so many times with my queries, worries, confusions, but I must say that every single time they have resolved issues satisfactorily.
I have never had any problems in dealing with USgobuy and recommend their professional yet personal services to everyone looking to purchase and ship goods from overseas.
